meanings.definition: A sexually attractive person, especially a woman.
meanings.sent1: The movie star was known as one of the biggest sexpots in Hollywood.
meanings.sent2: She turned heads wherever she went, a true sexpot.
meanings.sent3: The charming sexpot caught everyone's eye at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence and allure made her a true sexpot in the eyes of many.
meanings.sent5: The magazine cover featured a stunning sexpot in a glamorous gown.

meanings.definition: A person who is considered sexually promiscuous or alluring.
meanings.sent1: The gossip column labeled her as a notorious sexpot.
meanings.sent2: He had a reputation as a charming sexpot among his friends.
meanings.sent3: The playful sexpot always knew how to have a good time.
meanings.sent4: Her flirtatious nature earned her the title of the office sexpot.
meanings.sent5: The seductive dance routine showcased her as the ultimate sexpot on stage.

meanings.definition: A container, typically ceramic, used for holding plants or flowers.
meanings.sent1: She placed the delicate flowers in the decorative sexpot on the windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The garden was adorned with colorful sexpots filled with blooming plants.
meanings.sent3: The quirky sexpot added a touch of charm to the garden decor.
meanings.sent4: The antique sexpot was passed down through generations as a family heirloom.
meanings.sent5: The artisan crafted unique sexpots that became popular among plant enthusiasts.
